title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 101.2 - Membership
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 101.2 - Membership

State Regulations
(a) The Chief Administrator of the

Courts, in consultation with the Administrative Board of the Courts and with
the approval of the Chief Judge of the State of New York, shall appoint members
to the committee in such numbers as deemed necessary to effectively carry out
its duties and shall designate two co-chairs. (b) Each member shall be an active or
former judge or justice of the Unified Court System. (c) The members and the
co-chairs shall serve at the pleasure of the Chief Administrator. Co-chairs may
serve renewable five-year terms without limitation; other members may serve two
terms of five years each. Notes

101.2

New

York State Register November 16, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 46, eff. 11/16/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
